Short, A-line parka in twill made from a cotton blend with a drawstring hood, zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, and a drawstring hem. Lined.

Knee-length coat in a stretch cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons and side pockets. Long sleeves with an adjustable tab and press-studs at the cuffs, and a pleat at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in pattern-weave fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck and a V-neck at the back with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.

Short dress in pattern-weave fabric with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar that ties at the back of the neck and a V-neck at the back with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastening. Long sleeves, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
Coat in woven fabric with a lightly brushed finish. Notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, pockets in the side seams, a detachable belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.

Fitted, long-sleeved dress in soft jersey with a V-shaped mesh section front and back. Unlined.

Coat in an Italian wool blend with notch lapels and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable tie belt at the waist, welt side pockets, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.

Pyjamas with a short-sleeved top and trousers in soft organic cotton jersey. Top with a unique nursing feature, designed in a double layer to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Bottoms with an elasticated, V-shaped, wrapover waistband below the tummy for added comfort.
Top in soft pile with an embroidered appliqué on the front and a concealed press-stud at the back. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
